column7:
No: BM-2-901-13
Version: 2.1
Issue Date: 27/01/2026
Pending
Test_Objective
column10: Steps
column11: Expected_Result

column7: Verify unauthenticated user can access register page via direct URL
column8: User is not logged in, browser is open
column10:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/register
3. Verify page loads
column11: Register page displayed successfully with registration form

column7: Verify authenticated user accessing register page is redirected or handled appropriately
column10:
1. Login with valid credentials
2. Navigate to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/register
3. Observe behavior
column11: User redirected to customer account page or register page displayed with message, no duplicate registration allowed

column7: Verify user can access register page from top menu
column10:
1. Navigate to homepage
2. Click on 'Register' link in top menu
3. Verify redirect
column11: Register page displayed successfully

column7: Verify gender radio buttons are displayed and functional
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Locate gender radio buttons (Male/Female)
3. Click each option
column11: Both radio buttons are visible, clickable, and mutually exclusive

column7: Verify all required input fields are displayed
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Verify presence of: First name, Last name, Email, Password, Confirm password fields
column11: All input fields are visible with appropriate labels

column7: Verify password fields mask input
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Enter password in Password field
3. Verify characters are masked
column11: Password characters displayed as dots/asterisks

column7: Verify Register button is displayed and clickable
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Locate Register button
3. Verify styling and enabled state
column11: Register button is visible, properly styled, and enabled

column7: Verify page layout is responsive
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Resize browser window to different sizes
3. Test on mobile viewport
column11: Page layout adjusts appropriately, all elements remain accessible

column7: Verify successful registration with all valid data
column8: User on register page not logged in
column9:
Gender: Male
FirstName: John
LastName: Doe
Email: john.doe.{timestamp}@test.com
Password: Test@123456
ConfirmPassword: Test@123456
column10:
1. Select gender: Male
2. Enter First name: John
3. Enter Last name: Doe
4. Enter Email: john.doe.{timestamp}@test.com
5. Enter Password: Test@123456
6. Enter Confirm password: Test@123456
7. Click Register button
column11: Registration successful, success message displayed, user redirected to confirmation/account page

column7: Verify error message for email without @ symbol
column9:
Email: testuser.com
Other fields: valid data
column10:
1. Fill all fields with valid data
2. Enter email without @: testuser.com
3. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'Wrong email' or similar validation error

column7: Verify error message for email with invalid domain
column9:
Email: test@
Other fields: valid data
column10:
1. Fill all fields with valid data
2. Enter email: test@
3. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'Wrong email' or validation error displayed

column7: Verify error when registering with already registered email
column9:
Email: existing@test.com (already registered)
Other fields: valid data
column10:
1. Fill all fields with valid data
2. Enter email that already exists in system
3. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'The specified email already exists' or similar

column7: Verify validation when all fields are empty
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Click Register button without filling any field
column11: Validation errors displayed for all required fields

column7: Verify validation when first name is empty
column10:
1. Fill all fields except First name
2. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'First name is required'

column7: Verify validation when last name is empty
column10:
1. Fill all fields except Last name
2. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'Last name is required'

column7: Verify validation when email is empty
column10:
1. Fill all fields except Email
2. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'Email is required'

column7: Verify validation when password is empty
column10:
1. Fill all fields except Password
2. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'Password is required'

column7: Verify error when passwords don't match
column9:
Password: Test@123456
ConfirmPassword: Test@654321
Other fields: valid
column10:
1. Fill all required fields
2. Enter Password: Test@123456
3. Enter Confirm password: Test@654321
4. Click Register button
column11: Error message: 'The password and confirmation password do not match'

column7: Verify error when password is too short
column10:
1. Fill all required fields
2. Enter short password: 12345
3. Click Register button
column11: Error message about minimum password length requirement (6 characters)

column7: Verify handling of special characters in name fields
column9:
FirstName: John<script>
LastName: Doe'OR'1'='1
Other fields: valid
column10:
1. Enter special characters/script in First name and Last name
2. Fill other fields with valid data
3. Click Register button
column11: Either sanitized and accepted or validation error displayed

column7: Verify unauthenticated user can access login page via direct URL
column8: User is not logged in, browser is open
column10:
1. Open browser
2. Navigate to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/login
3. Verify page loads
column11: Login page displayed successfully with login form

column7: Verify authenticated user accessing login page is redirected
column10:
1. Login with valid credentials
2. Navigate to https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/login
3. Observe behavior
column11: User redirected to account dashboard or homepage, login page not accessible when already logged in

column7: Verify user can access login page from top menu
column10:
1. Navigate to homepage
2. Click on 'Log in' link in top menu
3. Verify redirect
column11: Login page displayed successfully

column7: Verify email and password fields are displayed
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Verify Email field is present
3. Verify Password field is present
column11: Both Email and Password fields are visible with appropriate labels

column7: Verify password field masks input
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter password in Password field
3. Verify characters are masked
column11: Password characters displayed as dots/asterisks

column7: Verify Log in button is displayed and clickable
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Locate Log in button
3. Verify styling and enabled state
column11: Log in button is visible, properly styled, and enabled

column7: Verify Remember me checkbox is present and functional
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Locate 'Remember me' checkbox
3. Click to check/uncheck
column11: Remember me checkbox is visible and toggles between checked/unchecked states

column7: Verify Forgot password link is present
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Locate 'Forgot password' link
3. Verify it's clickable
column11: Forgot password link is visible and clickable

column7: Verify successful login with valid credentials
column8: User has registered account, not logged in
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Log in button
column11: User logged in successfully, redirected to homepage/dashboard, user email displayed in header

column7: Verify error message when password is incorrect
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter incorrect password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Error message: 'Login was unsuccessful' or similar, user remains on login page

column7: Verify error message when email doesn't exist
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter non-existent email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Error message: 'Login was unsuccessful' or 'No customer account found', user remains on login page

column7: Verify validation when both fields are empty
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Leave both fields empty
3. Click Log in button
column11: Validation error displayed, user cannot login

column7: Verify validation when email is empty
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Leave email empty
3. Enter password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Error message: 'Please enter your email' or validation error

column7: Verify validation when password is empty
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter email
3. Leave password empty
4. Click Log in button
column11: Error message: 'Please enter your password' or validation error

column7: Verify error for invalid email format
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter email without @: testuser.com
3. Enter password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Browser validation error or error message about invalid email format

column7: Verify handling of special characters in email
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter email with special chars
3. Enter password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Validation error or sanitized input, login unsuccessful

column7: Verify remember me functionality when checked
column8: User on login page, has valid account
column9:
Email: validuser@test.com
Password: Test@123456
Remember me: checked
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Check 'Remember me' checkbox
4. Click Log in
5. Close browser
6. Reopen browser and navigate to site
column11: User session persisted, user still logged in after browser restart

column7: Verify remember me functionality when unchecked
column8: User on login page, has valid account
column9:
Email: validuser@test.com
Password: Test@123456
Remember me: unchecked
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Leave 'Remember me' unchecked
4. Click Log in
5. Close browser
6. Reopen browser and navigate to site
column11: User session not persisted, user logged out after browser restart

column7: Verify protection against SQL injection in email field
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter SQL injection pattern in email field
3. Enter any password
4. Click Log in button
column11: Login unsuccessful, no SQL injection vulnerability, appropriate error message

column7: Verify protection against XSS in email field
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter XSS script in email field
3. Enter password
4. Click Log in button
column11: No script execution, input sanitized or rejected, login unsuccessful

column7: Verify user can logout after logging in
column10:
1. Login with valid credentials
2. Locate Log out link in header
3. Click Log out
column11: User logged out successfully, redirected to homepage, login link visible again

column7: Verify session timeout after inactivity
column9: Wait time: as per session timeout setting
column10:
1. Login successfully
2. Remain inactive for session timeout period
3. Try to perform an action
column11: Session expired, user logged out or prompted to login again

column7: Verify user can register and immediately login with new account
column8: User not registered or logged in
column9:
Gender: Female
FirstName: Jane
LastName: Smith
Email: jane.smith.{timestamp}@test.com
Password: Secure@789
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Complete registration with new unique email
3. Note success message
4. Navigate to login page
5. Login with newly registered credentials
column11: Registration successful, then login successful with same credentials, user authenticated and redirected to account page

column7: Verify navigation from register page to login page
column10:
1. Navigate to register page
2. Locate link/button to login page
3. Click on it
column11: User navigated to login page successfully

column7: Verify navigation from login page to register page
column10:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Locate link/button to register page (if exists)
3. Click on it
column11: User navigated to register page successfully
